entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who left Harry stuff to do. He is described as someone who had the whole Order at his command.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who was given stuff to do by Dumbledore. He is also mentioned as being afraid of a 'concerned parent' attack and having to look directly into Mrs. Weasley's eyes.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who knows about the stuff that Dumbledore left Harry to do and wants to come too.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who knows about the stuff that Dumbledore left Harry to do and wants to come too.

entities.name: arthur weasley
entities.description: Arthur Weasley is mentioned as someone who has a right to know what Dumbledore left Harry to do.

entities.name: mr. granger
entities.description: Mr. Granger is mentioned as someone who would agree with Arthur Weasley that they have a right to know what Dumbledore left Harry to do.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as someone who is concerned about the stuff that Dumbledore left Harry to do and wants to know more about it.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as having eyes that are the same shade of brown as Mrs. Weasley's.
